other_tests.findings: Medullary thyroid carcinoma (MTC) and two hyperplastic parathyroid glands.
Plasma ACTH decreased to 75 pg/ml and serum cortisol decreased to 12.9 /H9262g/dl.
other_tests.changes_over_time: After 8 mg dexamethasone, ACTH decreased to 24 pg/ml and cortisol to 4.5 /H9262g/dl.

other_tests.findings: Histopathology demonstrated two adjacent pheochromocytomas, urinary cortisol, epinephrine, and calcium were normal.
Calcitonin decreased by 96% (5300 to 120 pg/ml) and ACTH by 91% (125 to 11 pg/ml).

other_tests.procedure_name: In Situ Hybridization (ISH) for Proopiomelanocortin (POMC) mRNA
other_tests.findings: POMC mRNA was positive in the MTC but not in the pheochromocytoma.

other_tests.changes_over_time: Follow-up MRI showed a less prominent gland post-surgery.
